title: Rads error
body:
When I try to open my game on my laptop without using open as admin, it says "unknown error check logs for more information". Can someone help me please?
By the way, I'm on windows 10.

replies.body: If running it as admin works, why not do that every time? To make it easier, right-click, "properties", "Compatibility", check "Run this program as an administrator", "apply", "ok". Now you don't have to choose "open as admin".

> [{quoted}](name=chrisvj,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EwVdb55A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-16T19:07:12.199+0000)
>
> If running it as admin works, why not do that every time? To make it easier, right-click, "properties", "Compatibility", check "Run this program as an administrator", "apply", "ok". Now you don't have to choose "open as admin".

Because every time I want to open as admin there is a popup window and i hate to always have to click yes

It sounds like your User Account Control settings are set quite high. You can adjust or disable this setting with [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions#wq2) to resolve this annoying popup when running as admin.
It doesn't answer my question. Is there an official fix to the unspecified error ? And don't redirect me to the update issue guide I already read it ten times
The official fix is to run the game as an administrator, which is why I linked you the guide to configure your UAC settings to not pop up every time you run League as admin.
